function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction in NO2 emissions due to decreased industrial activity and transportation","Impact":"Improvement in air quality and environmental conditions","Mitigation":"Developing sustainable and environmentally friendly industrial and transportation practices","Technologies":"Renewable energy sources, electric vehicles, emission control technology","People":"General public, environmental activists, government authorities","Owner":"Government authorities, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Reopening of factories leading to increased NO2 emissions","Impact":"Deterioration of air quality and environmental conditions","Mitigation":"Implementing strict pollution control measures, promoting clean energy solutions","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, emission control technology, renewable energy sources","People":"Residents in the affected areas, environmental activists, government authorities","Owner":"Government authorities, industrial organizations"}]}
